name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of hands-on experience, I specialize in leveraging **Kubernetes**, **OpenShift**, **Docker**, and **Ansible** for building and orchestrating scalable applications in hybrid cloud environments. My technical expertise includes proficient coding in **Python**, **Golang**, **Java**, and **C/C++**—ensuring robust automation and streamlined deployment processes. I excel in **Linux** systems and have a solid grasp of **NFV** and edge computing principles.

In addition to my infrastructure skills, I have a strong background in developing high-performance solutions within healthcare and financial sectors using advanced technologies like **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I've effectively led projects incorporating AI capabilities and predictive analytics while ensuring compliance with critical standards such as HIPAA. I have also constructed microservices architecture and implemented CI/CD automation, enhancing system reliability and efficiency.

Enabling real-time data processing and intelligent automation, I bring expertise in developing machine learning pipelines and serving ML models in production, utilizing tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. My strong communication skills allow me to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams, always striving for high-quality deliverables.
